snippet.title: Shadow of the Depth | Steam Early Access Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadow of the Depth is a top-down action roguelike with hand-drawn visuals. Featuring a dark world and five distinct characters, players will explore an ever-changing labyrinth with a fast-paced combat system. Do you have what it takes to conquer the depths?

⏰STEAM EARLY ACCESS LAUNCH DATE:
April 23, 2024

Wishlist (demo available): https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100150/Shadow_of_the_Depth/
#action #roguelike #GameTrailers
